name: CharityHappenings.org/ticketing
tag_list: online-ticketing, eventbrite, online-ticketing-software, charity-events, online-registration-software, cvent, eventbee
overview:
The CharityHappenings Ticketing platform has been launched to empower non-profits with free online ticketing software that takes their events to the next level. CharityHappenings Ticketing allows event organizers to list, promote and sell tickets with an exclusive, customized and easy-to-use management system.

Featuring unique customization tools to cater to the vast diversity of non-profit organizations, the program is already changing the face of communication and fundraising abilities for all non-profit events. Visit CharityHappenings.org/ ticketing to effectively reach the largest social community of philanthropic event attendees and maximize your event’s ticket sales. Call us (800) 610-TKTS (8587)

milestones.source_description: CNBC: CharityHappenings.org Launches Free Online Event-Ticketing for Nonprofits in Time for Fall Gala Season Nonprofits Gain Direct Exposure to 75,000 + Community of Event-Going Philanthropists
